title: FISCAL SECURITY
content:
Ord. 031211-42.

(A)

Before the single office may approve a plat, the subdivider shall:

(1)

obtain final approval of subdivision construction plans; post fiscal security as required
by the county executive for restoration of disturbed areas, boundary streets, and
sidewalks; and construct the streets, utilities, and drainage facilities in compliance
with the requirements of this title; or

(2)

file an application for approval of subdivision construction plans and provide fiscal
security under Section 30-1-132 (Fiscal Security) for subdivision improvements.

(B)

Fiscal security provided under this section may be used by the city or county, as
appropriate, to construct the subdivision improvements.

Source: City Code Section 25-4-37; County Code Section 82.401; Ord. 031211-11; Ord.
